name: Priyanshi Verma
tagline: Turning caffeine into code, one line at a time!
Aboutme:
Hey there, welcome to my little corner of the web! This is where I get to show off the cool stuff I've been working on and share a bit about myself.

I am Priyanshi Verma, a final year undergraduate with a passion for technology. My journey in tech has been an exciting mix of learning and creating. From developing web applications to exploring artificial intelligence, I love diving into the latest tech trends and applying them in innovative ways.In my free time, I enjoy reading tech blogs and spending time in nature. If I'm indoors, you'll probably find me engrossed in a captivating fiction novel.

If you find any interest in my projects or want to have a talk, feel free to drop me a message at priyanshiverma13@outlook.com. I'm always open to discussing tech, sharing ideas, and collaborating on new ventures.

projects.title: College-News-Scrapper
projects.description: Used NodeJS to collect news titles from College website with monitoring and designed a RESTful API
